A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The. Worst. Disappointment. Ever. 2 years of waiting and 40 years worth of storyline is supposed to be coming to a climax and the best Disney could come up with was terrible character development and bad CGI. I'm all for a new direction\, but never has there been two more disjointed movies than TFA and TLJ. This movie made no sense\, had no plot and was a complete bore.And who exactly was it for? Certainly not for the real fan base. Kids? It's a 2.5 hour bore\, kids will not like this.
